body: At 2nd level, a paladin with this oath heals 50% less when she uses lay on hands on herself, but 50% more than the normal amount when she uses it to heal others. Using lay on hands to harm undead deals the normal amount of damage. This ability otherwise works like and replaces lay on hands.
name: Charitable Hands
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Paladin/Paladin Archetypes/Oathbound Paladin/Oaths/Oath of Charity/Charitable Hands
